definition: course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial

sentences.english: Most of the panels in a tutorial use this design.
sentences.chinese: 教程中的大多数面板都使用这种设计。

sentences.english: In this tutorial we will use the 960 Grid System.
sentences.chinese: 在本教程中，我们将使用960网格系统。

sentences.english: Roach, P. English Phonetics and Phonology. Cambridge University Press, 1983.
sentences.chinese: 王桂珍，《英语语音教程》，高等教育出版社。

sentences.english: This article describes the PROTEL use in circuit simulation tutorials.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了在PROTEL中电路仿真的运用教程。

sentences.english: This tutorial will help you create your own oceanic water in Cinema 4D.
sentences.chinese: 本教程将帮助你创造你自己的四维影院海洋水。

sentences.english: They have excellent articles and tutorials.
sentences.chinese: 他们有优秀的文章和教程。

sentences.english: The template, however, is great to use as the example for this tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个模板非常适合作为本教程的例子。

sentences.english: This tutorial describes how to integrate resource management code into a touchpoint.
sentences.chinese: 本教程介绍如何将资源管理代码集成到接触点中。

sentences.english: In the context of this tutorial, you are mapping all fields.
sentences.chinese: 在本教程的环境中，您要映射所有字段。

sentences.english: What should I do before watching the video tutorial?
sentences.chinese: 在看视频教程前应该怎样做？

sentences.english: This is a video simulation software tutorial, very good, and want to help you.
sentences.chinese: 这是仿真软件的视屏教程，很好用，希望对你有帮助。

sentences.english: How Much Time Will this Tutorial Take?
sentences.chinese: 要花多长时间来学该教程？

sentences.english: some English, like Writing Courses and stuff like that.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些英语课程，像写作教程之类的。

sentences.english: For our tutorial, we only have one endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 对于本教程，我们仅有一个端点。

sentences.english: To determine whether a syllable is closed or open, look at the vowel.
sentences.chinese: 首先看看英文教程中关于开音节与闭音节的描述。

definition: illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram

dried food (including dried fruits, mushrooms and seafoods such as shrimp and abalone)/(fig.) (coll.) knowledge presented in readily assimilable form/just what you want to know: no more, no less (no 水分[shui3 fen1])
to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
